EmailTemplate.name: ES-2019-03-15 Platinum Partners Updated Terms.ES-2019-03-15 Platinum Partners Up
EmailTemplate.subject: Turbonomic Partner Status and Updated Commercial Terms
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
As we enter into our new fiscal year, we want to remind you of your current partner level and ensure that you’ve seen our updated commercial terms. Below is a snapshot of your Program Requirements & Discount Structure. Your Partner Level
Program Requirements and Discount Structure
To learn more about the Turbonomic Partner Program, and to find the updated Commercial Terms, please visit our new Partner Portal <[[https://turbonomic.webinfinity.com]]>.
If you have any questions, please contact your Turbonomic Partner Director, or email our Partner Desk <[[mailto:partnerdesk@turbonomic.com]]>.
Best Regards, Your Turbonomic Partner Team
